_header: He that made both sun and moon
Note: For the earlier text of which this is a revision see 1882.
Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Katharine — in 8-line stanzas

CamGon175.First Lines:
He þat made boþe sunne & moneIn heuene &
                    erþe for to schyne…
CamGon175.Last Lines:
…Þat seynt Kateryne is InneAmeN AmeN pur
                    charyte
CamGon175.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 242-59.
